website_summaries.verdict: A classic gaming experience plays out on the modern 3DS device.
pros: Features a completely remastered 3D version of the classic Zelda game
3D features of the 3DS are completely compatible with the game and does not require any special 3D glasses to function
cons: As a remake, the game's storyline may be less engaging for returning players

customer_reviews.title: Best version of the game
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this for the 3DS. I played this on the N64 and the bonus disk on Gamecube, but I feel like the controls for this game feel the best on this system. I usuaally don't make a big deal about the motion controls, but that made using the bow/slingshot much easier. Love that the boots are now items like in Windwaker so putting them on/taking them off is far easier. Mildly annoying that you have to play through the game first to unlock Master Quest, but that just gave me a chance to adjust to the controls and changes.
customer_reviews.author: Averey

customer_reviews.title: OOT is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing N64 and when Ocarina of Time came out it became my favorite Nintendo game of all time. Being able to play it in a handheld system with improved graphics is awesome. The controls are easy and its easy to pick up the game and just play. Great way to rejoice and relive my childhood. Its been over 20 years since the original OOT came out and it still holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games finally remastered!
customer_reviews.text: Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time is one of the best games ever made and it is finally remastered (more than 5 years ago)! If you played the N64 version then you already know what you should be in for, but with better graphics and an easier way to manage your items. I do not really want to get too much into the details but this is definitely an experience that everyone should go through at least once if they're gaming fans!
customer_reviews.author: Theotime Philippe

customer_reviews.title: It's new!
customer_reviews.text: Kiddo approved! He absolutely loves the game. It was in perfect new condition and plus well!
customer_reviews.author: Britney K.

customer_reviews.title: classic masterpiece!
customer_reviews.text: I love the game and i love being able to play it on my handheld 3ds device. I mainly only play it for nostalgia sake, but it's good to have around when the desire arises. This is a must-own game for N3DS whether you played the original version or not it's fun for all generations. I enjoy the graphics, but this is also coming from an adult whom grew up on SNES and still enjoy playing oldschool console games.
customer_reviews.author: Linkapola

customer_reviews.title: I NEED MORE STARS!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest game ever made. Period. It was so when it came out for the Nintendo 64; and it still holds true today. This is the exact same game that was on the 64, just cleaned up and polished to a 3d shine. Also included is the "master quest," which is essentially the same game just mirrored and sigificantly harder. Bottom line: this is a must have for any 3DS owner. If you're NOT a 3ds owner, this game is a reason to buy one. FANTASTIC!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Collins

customer_reviews.title: If you have or haven't played the 64 version (or ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have or haven't played the 64 version (or any emulated version) and you've always told yourself 'yeah, I'll play that game one day🙄' and you also happen to have a 3ds, try this out! Even without enabling 3d all the time (road trips with 3d makes me car sick) it's still a visual masterpiece. It perfectly captures the magic of Zelda, from the graphics, to the music, to Navi yelling 'Hey! LISTEN!' every other moment. You are a hero, Link. And it's time to save Hyrule!
customer_reviews.author: hella

customer_reviews.title: The best Zelda ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of the Zelda series but this one is by far and away the best Zelda game I've ever played! This might be my favorite game of all time. Be prepared to sink some serious time into this one. If you get stuck check out some of the many tutorials on youtube.
customer_reviews.author: The Perfectionist

customer_reviews.title: did not disappoint! The graphics update looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: I missed playing Ocarina of Time as a kid, but now I finally managed to try this legendary game. It's as much as a masterpiece as I've been led to believe, did not disappoint! The graphics update looks amazing, definitely a big improvement to the original. The controls worked fine, and the 3D effect wasn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia Reclaimed!
customer_reviews.text: Came in timely fashion as usual with prime. Perfect condition(New not used). No complaints here. So happy to have my childhood back with even greater detail and models than ever before. I'm on 2ds so i can only imagine how much better it would look on the 3ds.
customer_reviews.author: Jose O.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Game From My Childhood!
customer_reviews.text: It's so awesome to be able to play my favorite game from my childhood on a handheld system now. To me, this will always be my favorite Legend of Zelda game ever, so many great memories playing it back in the day on the Nintendo 64 when it first released.
customer_reviews.author: Zerowolf

customer_reviews.title: My favorite game so far
customer_reviews.text: Not a Zelda expert here , just a casual gamer. I find this game Beautiful, engaging , relaxing. I haven’t played this for long , but it has become my favorite 3DS XL game . I’m not a gamer , but have been getting into this handheld and PS4 to relax . Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LauGA

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Sure it's old now but retro games are in. Sorry I can't say much more cause it's my 12 year daughter who plays it, not me. Hope this helps. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Stianazon

customer_reviews.title: This game is a masterpiece
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this game screams nostalgia this game is the reason I got a new 3DS XL this game looks way better than N64 version but the new 3DS XL graphics are still outdated the IPS screen does a little Justice but it is still grainy when it comes to graphics recommend for anyone trying to reclaim N64 Ocarina of Time days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Is this game supposed to be so difficult? Two of my siblings and myself tried playing it and we couldn’t even get past the intro dungeon. Seems terrible, I’ve played and passed other Zelda games in the past. This one is zero fun by comparison. Maybe we gave up too quickly, I don’t know since so many others love it.
customer_reviews.author: JT@UTexas

customer_reviews.title: Better than ever
customer_reviews.text: As good as it gets. The touch screen makes menu and item switching a breeze. Graphics will look very dated to anyone who didn't play it long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Holy Diver

customer_reviews.title: This is not a review of the game but of amazon on this item
customer_reviews.text: So. this is rare for me. I got smash bros instead. and it would have cost me to send it back so I kept it. now I have to take the chance and buy this again. sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Satney

customer_reviews.title: you should know that this game could arguably be the greatest video game ever made
customer_reviews.text: First of all, if you haven't played Ocarina of Time before, you should know that this game could arguably be the greatest video game ever made. Graphics are better than the N64 version. The controls are better, items are faster and easier to equip and use, and I especially like the angle/motion detection of the 3ds and how it makes aiming and shooting a lot faster and more accurate. One of the only things I dislike was how they changed the cool crescent of Islam design on the mirror shield
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game no matter what console it's played on
customer_reviews.text: If anyone gives this game less and 5 stars, they're on crack! This game is a classic and one of my favorites, to have it on the go is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Threadgill

customer_reviews.title: Great as it was and is now
customer_reviews.text: Played all the way through. Almost the same level of mystification from originally playing the ‘98 release of this on N64. Really loved the graphics, the experience and the smoothness of the play. Perfect for those days off.
customer_reviews.author: Shadyshashashaooo

customer_reviews.title: One of, if not the best N64 game now remastered for the modern era.
customer_reviews.text: A great re-mastered of the Nintendo classic. Better graphics and sound with seamless controls like your playing the original. Must have of any Zelda fan.
customer_reviews.author: Pat S

customer_reviews.title: Classic experience with modern graphics and gameplay
customer_reviews.text: I played the original game on n64 and GameCube, and this far surpasses the experience I had on both of those consoles. The graphics are way better, 3d mode is awesome, and the gameplay is smoother and better because of the second screen and 3ds power. If you are a zelda fan this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: this game don't work - Zelda Ocarina of Timefor 3DS wished surpirise for birthday...
customer_reviews.text: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D and The Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time 3D for Nintendo 3DS must be a present - wished surpirise for birthday, unfortunately this game don't work in Europe. It was very unpleasant for me and the child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome. I loved this game on the N64 years ago, and now my 9 year old is playing it on his 3ds. He absolutely loves it! Still a wonderful gift even today.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Please buy this you will love it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. Packaging was absolutely perfect. The game was an amazing play. If you are wondering if the game is right for you I would highly recommend the play. Hours of fun and puzzle solving goes into the challenge of Links adventure. Comes in original box and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome port of a great classic
customer_reviews.text: Love this game, what can I say. It's a perfect port of OoT and the inventory management is greatly improved through the use of the lower screen. Love this game
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: One d the best games from the n64 is brought to the ds, making it so much easier to play wherever you go. The gameplay is the same, but the graphics have been upgraded, while keeping the charm from the original game.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Luster

customer_reviews.title: Good price, great game!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for m daughter because she loved the N64 version and this is the exact same game with the portability of the DS. She loves it and the game was brand new as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great game. Okay 3d.
customer_reviews.text: The 3d makes the game feel smaller and sometimes it can confuse my eyes. Some of the graphics have been changed, some haven't. I would he fine with the original graphics, but the newer graphics aren't terrible. The game itself is, in my opinion, one of the best ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: This is a great update to the original
customer_reviews.text: This is a great update to the original, which I played forever ago on N64. I didn't think I would get that into this version, being on a handheld, but I plowed through half the game in two or three sittings. This is basically the game as you remember it in your mind from 1998, as opposed to the actual version that, if you go back to and play now, really shows some rough edges.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great Zelda Nostalgia!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game because my sons and I played it when they were boys. The Zelda games have always been my favorite, pure quality in all aspects. The game itself arrived right on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Detroiter

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my younger brothers birthday. He's ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my younger brothers birthday. He's a freshman in college and asked for this specifically. He said he really likes it and it distracts him when he gets too stressed so I guess it does what it was intended to do. He really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Jules2625

customer_reviews.title: Best Zelda Game Ever Made
customer_reviews.text: Forget Breadth of the Wild. If you've never played Ocarina of Time, you haven't played a true Zelda game. This one is a classic, and for good reason. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value great
customer_reviews.text: My kids are enjoying the game great value came in good condition for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A really good classic
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome classic Zelda game. It's definitely one of the best in the series. I definitely would recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: T.D.

customer_reviews.title: easy decision
customer_reviews.text: same as my majora 3ds review, if you loved ocarina on 64, then you'll love this too.
customer_reviews.author: Xero

customer_reviews.title: Great version of a classic.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the original game on N64, and this 3DS version is an improvement in nearly every part. It looks nicer, it plays smoother, it irons out parts of the game people found tedious or annoying in previous versions, and it's packed with a new challenge in the from of the Master Quest. About the only thing I don't like is the audio. The compositions are fine, but they didn't upgrade the cheesy MIDI tracks from the N64 original. (There's a whole story behind the choice of audio, but I'm reviewing the end result, which I don't like.) Audio aside, this is the definitive version of the game.
customer_reviews.author: Trvial

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: Great game....My 13 years old son plays a lot and told me that the game is long and very entertaining. Easy to play and good graphics. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: DO0930

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: I missed out on getting this game when it first came out for 3ds but I'm so glad it's in my collection now. Bought brand new and it even had the plastic around the case. Very very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good game.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift but the person I gave it to just loves it. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The nostalgia was strong!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift. I have say this game brings back all sort of pleasant memories for me. I think this game was the first game I played on the N64 back in the day.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing as always
customer_reviews.text: What can i say, a classic is a classic. I got this for my girlfrie d to play so she can experience the glorious old days of one of zeldas first games. She absolutely loves it! Didnt have any issues with gameplay, no glitching and worked right out of box as it should. Id always recommend this game to anyone looking to get into zelda games.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: A very fun game that was not disappointing. The game graphics improved and I love the open world provided in this game. It works smoothly the gameplay is very fun. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jamila Brown

customer_reviews.title: Must-own
customer_reviews.text: I can finally get back to this game! This time I will get past the water temple and finish the game! Awesome must-own classic game and it looks amazing in your hands on the 3ds!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game love it
customer_reviews.text: I remember this game on the Nintendo 64 when I was like 3-4 and I used to love it, and still do! Seeing it remastered and in 3D is awesome I love this game and highly recommend the game.
customer_reviews.author: Kainen

customer_reviews.title: Superb Zelda game
customer_reviews.text: Probably the greatest game from Nintendo. Now I can take it with me wherever I go. Hyrule is just a button click away, adventure awaits.
customer_reviews.author: M Regal

customer_reviews.title: Great Game and Great Update!
customer_reviews.text: While never playing the N64 version until much later, I'm glad there was a remastered version of this for the 3DS. It's everything I want in a good adventure game! Some of the feature that were changed for the 3DS is a good addition and makes the gameplay a lot more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Park

customer_reviews.title: Lovely remaster of an original masterpiece
customer_reviews.text: This is very true to the original, except with better visuals. It brings me down memory lane to play it!

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games ever made.
customer_reviews.text: I seriously wonderful game. Brought back memories of my childhood and was so happy to finally own and complete it. One of the best games ever made.

customer_reviews.title: A great experience in the Land of Hyrule
customer_reviews.text: Reliving my childhood on an easier to handle platform. Looks great, plays great, very satisfied with my purchase. Good for new or old fans to the Legend of Zelda.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great game. My kids love it. The package arrived on time with no signs of damage.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for one of the greatest game ever made
customer_reviews.text: Great price for one of the greatest game ever made. Don't miss the chance to ad this to your collection, you would regret later. There's nothing much to say about the game, it's fantastic. This one don't have manual, just the warning papers, the cartridge it's the same.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works on any DS system!
customer_reviews.text: Brand New! A great game and addition to ant DS owner. The Ocarina of Time is a classic originally released for the Nintendo64!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and couldn't put it down! I've played many of the Legend of Zelda games but hadn't tried this one yet. I love it! I was so scared to play it because of the graphics and being used to the newest games but it's great!

customer_reviews.title: nintendo
customer_reviews.text: Received very quickly, will make a great gift, Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Played this when I was a kid and have enjoyed watching my kids play it. After beating the game it let’s you play it over with some changes and a higher difficulty. Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: One of the greatest games of all time and this version is even better than original.

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I Remember!
customer_reviews.text: I played this for the N64 when I was little, but only a few hours of it. Now I love it and, come hell or high water, I WILL beat it! It helps that it is a handheld game more than anyone can imagine too.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!

customer_reviews.title: 😱😱😱
customer_reviews.text: Just like the old N64 game but in 3D it’s way better!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My son was so happy to get this game, this was one of his favorite games growing up

customer_reviews.title: Same classic game made better.
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Brings back tons of memories of childhood, and Nintendo still found a way to improve upon the original with small tweaks to controls and gameplay here and there. Will be revisiting this game at least once a year now that it's on a handheld.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just jumped back to my 64 days Just great Thanks for the remaster!!!

customer_reviews.title: It's OoT and I bought it very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game. Amazing port. Like all 3DS games I like to turn the 3D down to half way to enjoy the games. This game is no exception. I'm not really digging the menu interface but I'm not going to dock a star from OoT for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cy Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game, didn't know it had remastered graphics too so that was a definite plus! Nintendo selects so it was only $20, and it includes the Master Quest upon completion of the main game. Was blown away by the 3D and have yet to see any frame drop while playing with it on!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: A revival of a beloved game
customer_reviews.text: Although I'm not sold on the 3D aspect of the game for the original 3DS, it's great to be able to play this game again and be able to share it with my kids. Now my children finally get the joke when I'm behind them mocking Navi. "Hey!" "Listen!" "Watch out!"
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B

customer_reviews.title: A++

customer_reviews.title: Great game!

customer_reviews.title: Bought it used, seems brand new
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting to have the actual case rather then the generic one but of course I bought it used so I'm still pretty satisfied, the case is free of damage and the game cartridge itself looks brand new. Works good and the game is fun for any zelda fan, well worth the buy. Also was expecting it to be delivered anywhere between Jan 11th-17th and I got it today the 10th. Thank you!

customer_reviews.text: Moms need to get this for the kids if you want a hour of peace a day!

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, everything as expected!
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% pleased with my purchase. The game was excellent and sold at an excellent price. The game came as quickly as expected and will definitely buy from this seller again.

customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this. It got here on time, it's in great shape, and it runs perfectly. I am currently playing any I have had no issues at all.

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo should play it again
customer_reviews.text: I wish Nintendo did more zeldas like this and not the boring, nonsense and devil stuff it created on breath of the wild. Please Nintendo, play this or majoras game and create the next installment.
customer_reviews.author: gon

customer_reviews.title: A true classic given the treatment and respect it deserves
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much to say about this. It's one of the best and most revolutionary Zelda games made with a gorgeous coat of paint, immersive use of the 3DS' tech, and it's now portable at an even cheaper price. Don't miss out on this, whether for nostalgia's sake or if this is your first time experiencing it!
customer_reviews.author: Javin Mather

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Very fun remake of the original classic. The 3D effects are cool and it stays true to the original gameplay. Being able to just close the lid of the 3DS and resume right where I left off is a huge bonus.

customer_reviews.title: My Boys Love Zelda
customer_reviews.text: Both my boys have played this game over and over. They love it. (one is now 8 and the other 13 years old)
customer_reviews.author: XPRT SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Great Zelda Game/Game In General
customer_reviews.text: Have already spent hours playing this game. Just a great Legend of Zelda title that everyone should play. The updated graphics are really great and the controls are easy to use. My only complaint is that the 3D effects don't always work as intended and can cause ghosting/ double images.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Arrieta

customer_reviews.title: He has enjoyed playing it so far
customer_reviews.text: My son's first Legend of Zelda game. He has enjoyed playing it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Thomas

product_meta.title: Nintendo Selects: The Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time 3D
product_meta.description: Nintendo Selects highlights a variety of great games at a great price, including this one. The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time 3D brings a completely re-mastered version of an epic entry in the beloved The Legend of Zelda game series to Nintendo's newest hand-held system, Nintendo 3DS. The game couples phenomenally enhanced graphics with stunning, glasses-free 3D visuals to bring to life the daring adventures of its hero, Link. A streamlined touch-screen interface and newly implemented motion controls provide a fresh and intuitive feel as players immerse themselves in the tale of the creation of Hyrule and the struggle for control of its all-powerful ancient relic. The game will also feature new challenges not included in the original game. The Legend of Zelda veterans can look forward to the Master Quest - a second quest with revamped puzzles and redesigned dungeons that feature the same graphical and interface upgrades as the main game. The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time 3D is a masterful improvement on one of the landmark releases in video game history.
feature_bullets: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time 3D brings a completely re-mastered version of an epic entry in the beloved The Legend of Zelda game series to Nintendo’s newest hand-held system, Nintendo 3DS.
The game couples phenomenally enhanced graphics with stunning, glasses-free 3D visuals to bring to life the daring adventures of its hero, Link.
The game also features new challenges not included in the original.
